import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const NavBar = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); function changeHeight() { setOpen(!open); } useEffect(() => { changeHeight }, [open]) return (
  • Home

); }; export default NavBar;
